name: PowerCorps: Nuclear Attack
description:
How long can you survive the alien invasion? Attempt to stop the unstoppable in this futuristic shooter and let us know if you can beat our highest score of 203!

This is our first shoot em up game as a submission for Mini Jam 73.

Controls:

  • Press the arrow keys to move around.
  • Shoot with the X key.
  • Hold the Z key for slower movement.

Soundtrack

Ouroboros by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4996-ouroboros
